meaningMnemonic: If 創造 is <kanji>creation</kanji>, then you add 的 to it, which means you have a creational thing, which is quite <vocabulary>creative</vocabulary> wouldn't you say?
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
